about_the_game:
"Sever's Zone" is a First Person Shooter in an alternative universe based on dozens of books and games on the theme of "Stalker". At the same time, "Sever's Zone" only resembles the game "Stalker" - it has no stalkers, no Chernobyl station, no other elements exclusive to "Stalker", but has much in common for the entire universe - the Anomalous Zone, artifacts and anomalies, researchers and inhabitants of the Zone.

The main feature of "Sever's Zone" is the original story written by the author of the game based on his science fiction book, published earlier.

The game will take the player through a story in which several characters will help him learn to survive in the Zone. From the very beginning the player will have a strong dose of ether radiation - a strange radiation that permeates the entire Zone as a result of episodic Breakdowns. The protagonist, having miraculously survived the deadly Breakdown, must reach the scientists' base, where, according to rumors, there are specialists who can help him reduce the ether overdose. However, due to the recent Breakdown, all the anomalies in the Zone are shuffled, all the passages between locations are closed, and the protagonist must find a way through all these obstacles and reach the scientists' base.
